trans-unit.source: Exposes methods used to return metadata about a service.
trans-unit.target: Espone i metodi utilizzati per restituire i metadati relativi a un servizio.

trans-unit.source: When programming [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] services, it is useful to publish metadata about the service.
trans-unit.target: Durante la programmazione [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] services, è utile pubblicare i metadati relativi al servizio.

trans-unit.source: For example, metadata can be a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document that describes all of the methods and data types employed by a service.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, i metadati possono essere un documento Web Services Description Language (WSDL) che descrive tutti i metodi e tipi di dati impiegati da un servizio.

trans-unit.source: Returning metadata about an [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service allows consumers of a service to easily create clients for the service.
trans-unit.target: Restituzione di metadati su un [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] servizio consente ai consumer di un servizio di creare facilmente client per il servizio.

trans-unit.source: For more information about [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] metadata endpoints, see [Metadata](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] endpoint dei metadati, vedere [metadati](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Services implemented using [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] publish metadata by exposing one or more metadata endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Servizi implementati utilizzando [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] pubblicare metadati esponendo uno o più endpoint dei metadati.

trans-unit.source: Metadata endpoints in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] have an address, a binding and a contract like any other endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Gli endpoint dei metadati in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] dispone di un indirizzo, un'associazione e un contratto come qualsiasi altro endpoint.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference> interface specifies the service contract implemented by all metadata endpoints in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference>interfaccia specifica il contratto di servizio implementato da tutti gli endpoint di metadati in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference>

trans-unit.source: There is no need to implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference> contract in your service implementation.
trans-unit.target: Non è necessario implementare la <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference>contratto nell'implementazione del servizio.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference>

trans-unit.source: Instead, add the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceMetadataBehavior> to the service description.
trans-unit.target: Aggiungere invece la <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceMetadataBehavior>alla descrizione del servizio.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceMetadataBehavior>

trans-unit.source: Or, when using configuration, set the `contract` attribute of the endpoint element to `IMetadataExchange`.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, quando si utilizza configurazione, impostare il `contract` attributo dell'elemento endpoint da `IMetadataExchange`.

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Publish Metadata for a Service Using a Configuration File](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio, vedere [procedura: pubblicare metadati per un servizio utilizzando un File di configurazione](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For details on publishing metadata in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] see [Publishing Metadata](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate sulla pubblicazione dei metadati in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] vedere [pubblicazione dei metadati](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Starts an asynchronous retrieval of metadata.
trans-unit.target: Avvia un recupero asincrono dei metadati.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> that should be processed to determine the metadata to return.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>che devono essere elaborati per determinare i metadati da restituire.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.AsyncCallback> that points to the method that will process the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.AsyncCallback>che punta al metodo che elaborerà i metadati.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: Any data which allows the caller to determine which asynchronous call is being returned.
trans-unit.target: Viene restituito alcun dato che consente al chiamante di determinare quale chiamata asincrona.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that can be passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IMetadataExchange.EndGet*> method.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.IAsyncResult>che possono essere passate al <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IMetadataExchange.EndGet*>metodo.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IMetadataExchange.EndGet*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Concludes the retrieval of metadata.
trans-unit.target: Si conclude il recupero dei metadati.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that contains data used to further process the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.IAsyncResult>che contiene i dati utilizzati per elaborare ulteriormente i metadati.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> containing the processed metadata.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>contenente i metadati elaborati.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: Returns the service metadata.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce i metadati del servizio.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> that contains the request for metadata.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>che contiene la richiesta di metadati.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> containing the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>contenente i metadati.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>
